Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-47619 affecting package syslog-ng for versions less than 3.33.2-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-47619 affecting package syslog-ng for versions less than 3.33.2-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package syslog-ng is earlier than 3.33.2-8, affected by CVE-2024-47619
